code: export var loadState=function loadState(){try{var serializeState=localStorage.getItem('todoList');if(serializeState===null){return[];}return JSON.parse(serializeState);}catch(err){return[];}};export var saveState=function saveState(state){try{var serializeState=JSON.stringify(state);localStorage.setItem('todoList',serializeState);}catch(err){console.log(err);}};
